version_description:
-compatible with ICD 10
-PACS link integration
-added new command for Scribe dictation "show CPT list". Use this command to assist in picking CPT and E & M codes.
-minor bug fixes

- Compatible with iOS 10
- Introduced new Charge Capture video and Photo capture video in our Help section
- Fixed the issue with displaying special characters in progress note from Scribe screen
- Fixed reported crashing issue on Schedule view
- Minor bug fixes

- The Merge Template feature has been disabled for Scribe
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

- Updated Dragon Medical SpeechKit 3.1 Service Release 12
- Bug fixes and improvements
- Resolved issue in Scribe where the speech to text toolbar would crash when tapping on the options icon.
